name: Bomb Boy
description:
A work in progress Metroidvania! This is my first game, but I would actually *prefer* if you insulted the game, so i can improve it.

A lot of things are broken in this update like the health bar and double jump doesnt work well with wall slide.

V. Pre-alpha 0.2
Added purple area with wall jump ability. Established a metroidvania genre, added health bar, added double jump, expanded on default area.
